item.title: CLARITY Act Draft Curbs Stablecoin Yield, Giving Banks A Potential Edge
item.description: The latest CLARITY Act draft restricts passive stablecoin yields, favoring banks and sparking potential Coinbase withdrawal from bill support.

item.title: Why Is Diageo Stock Rising Premarket Today?
item.description: The liquor giant is reportedly exploring options for its Chinese assets.
